title: Pantheon Needs a Rework
body: With all these reworks on champions, i cannot help but feel for pantheon, hes left to deal with changes to champions he fought oh so well before they got pimped! He is starting to feel left out and me and him were talking and we think riot should show him so love and spice up his life he's just eager to try something new and run with it. Come on guys back the spartan!

replies.body: I feel as though he is fine as is. I only play him in the jungle though. Just got a penta with him last night actually!
Leave my pantheon alone! He is perfect.
I love him but he can be so much better as his kit is so out dated
I agree, his thematic is solid and there's so much that could be done with him in my opinion.
